LanguageData.OE_Cooler.label: obsidia cooler
LanguageData.OE_Cooler.description: An Obsidia device that converts electricity into cool air. Can be used to cool down rooms during summer, or to create a walk-in freezer.
LanguageData.OE_Heater.label: obsidia heater
LanguageData.OE_Heater.description: An Obsidia device that converts electricity into heat. Can be used to heat rooms during winter.
LanguageData.OE_WallCooler.label: obsidia wall cooler
LanguageData.OE_WallCooler.description: A wall-mounted Obsidia device that converts electricity into cool air. Can be used to cool down rooms during summer, or to create a walk-in freezer.
LanguageData.OE_WallHeater.label: obsidia wall heater
LanguageData.OE_WallHeater.description: A wall-mounted Obsidia device that converts electricity into heat. Can be used to heat rooms during winter.
